content: @Paul Lynch Do you know where is the page with all the lhcforms versions for downloading?
(a flat page with just a list of zips)

oh and knowing it is https://clinicaltables.nlm.nih.gov/lforms-versions/ (thank you, browser history) ;)
which version is the one I should use? I am updating the Forms preview in FHIR IGs
This one? https://clinicaltables.nlm.nih.gov/lforms-versions -- Oh I see you found it. I should have clicked to see the whole thread.

Which version to use would depend on whether something is broken for you with the version you are currently using. We are still working on some bugs in the betas. If the latest non-beta works for you, I would stick with that.
